control.name: Define the retention periods of the data
control.desc:
Define retention periods within the design phase for all data fields taking into account the defined purpose. These retention periods can be variable (e.g. 5 years after latest interaction with data subject). Retention periods for back-ups should also be included.

You must include your DPO/Legal department to define the retention periods as other laws may impact the retention requirements.

test.steps:
1. Verify documentation exists which details user personal data retention policy requirements for all user personal data submitted within the application user interface.
  2. Ensure the above is in accordance with the requirements of the Data Protection Practitioner.
  3. Check if user personal data exists within the operational environment that exceeds the age of the retention policy.
